summary: THE CONSUMER REQUEST REIMBURSEMENT FOR REPAIRS MADE TO POWER STEERING.  *MR  THE CONSUMER CONTACTED CHEVROLET IN REGARD TO REIMBURSEMENT RECALL#1159156, STATING THAT HER VEHICLE EXPERIENCED THE SAME SYMPTOMS.  THE DEALER DENIED REIMBURSEMENT DUE TO NOT BEING ABLE TO VERIFY CAUSE OF HE MALFUNCTION OF THE LOWER PINION BEARING OF THE VEHICLES POWER STEERING.  THE RACK WAS REPLACED.  SCC
